greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The number of 3-digit multiples of n whose digits sum to n.
example: a(1)=1 as 100 is the only 3-digit multiple of 1 whose digits sum to 1, while a(19)=1 as 874 is the only 3-digit multiple of 19 with the property.
results.author: _Ian Duff_, Jun 08 2008
